name: Jessica Yang
body:
Hey. 

I'm Jessica Yang and I started out on the web as a blogger, writing book reviews and other book-related posts at [Crazy Red Pen](http://crazyredpen.com), in 2009. Since then, I've also written for Huffington Post, Quirk Books blog, Mochi Mag and more. I'm passionate about Asian American Pacific Islander issues, especially as it relates to literature, as well as the intersection of health and pop culture. 

I'm also a biochemistry and psychology student and I love seeing two different fields of study connect.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
